Finally, heFlemingThe youth, after rushing about and throw- hiing interrogations at the heedless bands of retreating infantry,

The man screamed. "Let'go me! Letgo me!" His face
was livid and his eyes were rolling uncontrolled. He was heaving and panting. He still grasped his rifle, perhaps
